text:
WESi I drew this up to show' that (in case Kellogg asks) any
balance we might have left at the end of they year is not a
result of “under-expending** Kellogg grant funds, but rather a
result of our increasing ability to derive income from other
sources - which is something Kellogg has been wanting us to do.
I have also a more specific break-down (within the various
accounts) for our own information, in case you’d like to seeit
some time.
hwh
6/22/56
